A small Tecmo update.....
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2003 Topics (Year of the Counter): A small Tecmo update.....
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, December 3, 2003 - 01:52 pm:

I spoke to Brian on the phone yesterday, and found out a few small nuggets of information. Apparently, sales of MR4 are doing fine (of course they could always be better!), and there are plans for more MR games in the future. (no details, no specifics)

There are also some new games coming next year, games that are not sequels to any exising Tecmo games!
